definition: horse's hoof/horseshoe/Chinese water chestnut (Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: This special blade on his knife is for picking stones out of horses' feet.
sentences.chinese: 他刀上有一特制刀刃，是用来剔去马蹄上的石头的。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the treatment of refractory clubfoot in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高儿童顽固性马蹄内翻足畸形的治疗效果。

sentences.english: In former times the typical "royal" horse shoe shapes have been built to serve the needs of the political surrounding.
sentences.chinese: 近代所流行的马蹄型就是为了适应政治氛围的需求。

sentences.english: The clip-clop of horses' hooves came closer and stopped right in front of the inn.
sentences.chinese: 嘀嘀哒哒的马蹄声越来越近就停在小店门前。

sentences.english: Many men have told stories of Old Clubfoot's courage.
sentences.chinese: 许多男人讲故事的旧马蹄内翻足的勇气。

sentences.english: I say a horse at a canter coming up, Joe.
sentences.chinese: 一片快速激烈的马蹄声来到坡上。

sentences.english: The sound of a horse at a gallop came fast and furiously up thehill.
sentences.chinese: 一片快速激烈的马蹄声来到坡上。

sentences.english: The magnet is usually made in the shape of horseshoe so that it will be as strong as possible.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁通常是做成马蹄形的，以便使其磁性尽可能地强。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of contradrainage and thread drawing method to treat high anal horseshoe fistula (HAHS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨对口引流挂线在治疗高位马蹄瘘的效果。

sentences.english: The arrival of spring flower season, calla different patterns.
sentences.chinese: 在春暖花的季节，马蹄莲形态各异。

sentences.english: A squeak of wheels and plod of hoofs came from the road.
sentences.chinese: 路边这时传来了车轮的吱嘎声和马蹄的声响。

sentences.english: The knots, it turns out, aren't getting enough horseshoe crab eggs to eat.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，红腹滨鹬没有吃到足够的马蹄蟹卵。

sentences.english: The snow balled under the horse's feet.
Without the hoof shaped rhyme, Chinese antithetical couplets may not be differentiated from poetry, Ci and Qu.
sentences.chinese: 马蹄韵使对联与诗词曲特别是诗的界限变得清晰。

sentences.english: The tracks of the horse's hoofs were seen deeply marked in the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 马蹄的痕迹仍然深深地印在泥土上。

sentences.english: The tramp of a horse was apparent, approaching the front of the building.
sentences.chinese: 越来越近的得得的马蹄声更加清晰了。

definition: lit. people shouting and horses neighing (idiom)/fig. tumultuous/hubbub
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
horse's head/same as 碼頭|码头[ma3 tou2], pier
